name: Le Chef Farteaut
description:
Fart through your restaurant's radioactive kitchen fighting giant cockroaches!

You are Péter, Le Chef Farteaut. You have a serious case of abdominal disturbance. Yeah, that kind.

You have to fight and struggle through the craziest kitchen to be able to get to the bathroom on time. Fart in your advantage! But be careful, it may not be very reliable. You can jump higher and fart boost to walk faster.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 32 with theme "An Unconventional Weapon".

Controls:
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Z
  • Fart: X
